body_html:
As a workaround, You can install nvidia drivers and cuda on your system even if you do not have a NVIDIA GPU and install the GPU version. Or if you have a GPU and install the GPU version, you can use CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES environment variable to run TensorFlow only on CPU.

I will close this issue as there has not been any updates for a long time, but we have a few initiatives which can help with this issue in the long term.
body_text:
As a workaround, You can install nvidia drivers and cuda on your system even if you do not have a NVIDIA GPU and install the GPU version. Or if you have a GPU and install the GPU version, you can use CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES environment variable to run TensorFlow only on CPU.
I will close this issue as there has not been any updates for a long time, but we have a few initiatives which can help with this issue in the long term.
body:
As a workaround, You can install nvidia drivers and cuda on your system even if you do not have a NVIDIA GPU and install the GPU version. Or if you have a GPU and install the GPU version, you can use `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES` environment variable to run TensorFlow only on CPU.

I will close this issue as there has not been any updates for a long time, but we have a few initiatives which can help with this issue in the long term.
